Basic Information.name: Unique ID
Basic Information.help: Global unique ID of this object.

Basic Information.name: Unique Name
Basic Information.help: Global unique Name of this object.

Basic Information.name: Owner ID
Basic Information.help: ID of user who creates this object.

Basic Information.name: Owner Group ID
Basic Information.help: ID of group of user who creates this object.

Basic Information.name: Original Object ID
Basic Information.help: ID of source object of this object, if this object is a copy of an existing object.

Basic Information.name: Child Object IDs
Basic Information.help: ID of all child objects, if this object is a container object.

Basic Information.name: ID
Basic Information.help: Please enter a unique identifier used in your lab.

Basic Information.name: Description
Basic Information.help: Please enter detailes about this fluorescent protein.

Basic Information.name: Used Vector / Plasmid
Basic Information.help: If vector / plasmid are available enter the name and ID of the vector / plasmid here. Include a link to the respective plasmid/vector database.

Basic Information.name: Organism
Basic Information.help: Please enter the organism from which the fluorescent protein was obtained.

Basic Information.name: Protein Length and Molecular Weight
Basic Information.help: Please enter the length and molecular weight of the fluorescent protein. Example: GFP 238aa, ~27kDa

Basic Information.name: Modifications
Basic Information.help: Please enter modification such as mutations, deletions, insertions that have been introduced to generate the protein.

Basic Information.name: Reference PubMed ID
Basic Information.help: Please enter the PubMed ID of the paper.

Basic Information.name: Reference Paper
Basic Information.help: Please enter the citation of the paper where the protein was described.

Basic Information.name: Reference DOI
Basic Information.help: Please enter the digital object identifier (doi) of the paper.

Basic Information.name: PDB ID
Basic Information.help: Please enter the RCSB protein data bank ID of the protein Example: 1EMA

Spectral Properties.name: Absorption Maximum
Spectral Properties.help: Please enter the wavelength of the excitation maximum.

Spectral Properties.name: Absorption Spectrum
Spectral Properties.help: Please upload an ASCII file containing the excitation spectrum.

Spectral Properties.name: Excitation Maximum
Spectral Properties.help: Please enter the wavelength of the excitation maximum.

Spectral Properties.name: Excitation Spectrum
Spectral Properties.help: Please upload an ASCII file containing the excitation spectrum.

Spectral Properties.name: Emission Maximum
Spectral Properties.help: Please enter the wavelength of the emission maximum.

Spectral Properties.name: Emission Spectrum
Spectral Properties.help: Please upload an ASCII file containing the emission spectrum.

Additional Information.name: Contact Person
Additional Information.help: Please enter the names and departments of the contact persons or principal investigators who are responsible for this entry and should be contacted for further questions.

Additional Information.name: Notes
Additional Information.help: Please enter and link all further information which is important to the fluorescent protein.
